participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, Alex is passionate about music and values personal growth.
participant_1.background: I was able to combine my passion for music and my career when I started my own indie band. I'm afraid of my mom coming back into my life and ruining my new life. I remember listening to Marduk with my friends in the basement. My mom taught me how to play the cello. I worked as a server at a restaurant before getting my current job.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and nurturing, Jordan enjoys spending time with friends and family and has a whimsical side.
participant_2.background: I'm going to watch some Jacob Sartorius music videos on YouTube and study for my upcoming exams. I want to be reincarnated as a cat so I can spend my days lazing around in the sun and chasing mice. I do not have kids, but I love taking my friends to local coffee shops and bookstores. I like to read pet training blogs and websites. I have a ten year old son.

content.text: Hi, what are you up to today?
I'm going to watch some Jacob Sartorius music videos on YouTube and study for my upcoming exams. What about you?
I'm going to spend the day writing music for my indie band. I'm also a little worried about my mom coming back into my life and ruining my new life.
Oh, that sounds scary. What happened between you and your mom?
She was a drug addict and she was always in and out of jail. She left me when I was 10 years old and I never saw her again.
That must have been really tough. I'm sorry you had to go through that.
Thanks. It was, but I'm doing a lot better now.
Yeah, I have a good life now and I'm just trying to focus on the future.
That's the best thing to do. I'm sure you'll be fine.
No problem. Have a great day!
